trans-unit.source: by Maarten van Gompel, Centre for Language and Speech Technology, Radboud University Nijmegen
trans-unit.target: 奈梅亨拉德布德大学语言与语音技术中心的Maarten van Gompel
网站：https : //proycon.github.io/clam 源存储库：https : //github.com/proycon/clam/ 文档：https : //clam.readthedocs.io 安装：

trans-unit.source: CLAM allows you to quickly and transparently transform your Natural Language Processing application into a RESTful webservice, with which both human end-users as well as automated clients can interact. CLAM takes a description of your system and wraps itself around the system, allowing end-users or automated clients to upload input files to your application, start your application with specific parameters of their choice, and download and view the output of the application once it is completed.
trans-unit.target: CLAM允许您快速透明地将您的自然语言处理应用程序转换为RESTful webservice,人类终端用户以及自动客户端都可以与之交互。CLAM对您的系统进行描述,并将自己包裹在系统中,允许终端用户或自动客户端将输入文件上传到您的应用程序,用他们选择的特定参数启动您的应用程序,并在应用程序完成后下载和查看其输出。

trans-unit.source: CLAM also has some optional dependencies. For MySQL support, install
trans-unit.target: CLAM也有一些可选的依赖关系。为了支持MySQL,请安装

trans-unit.source: CLAM can be installed from the Python Package Index using pip. Pip is usually part of the
trans-unit.target: CLAM可以使用pip从Python包索引中安装。Pip通常是

trans-unit.source: CLAM is entirely written in Python, runs on UNIX-derived systems, and is available as open source under the GNU Public License (v3). It is set up in a modular fashion, and offers an API, and as such is easily extendable. CLAM communicates in a transparent XML format, and using XSL transformation offers a modern client-side generated web-interface for human end users.
trans-unit.target: CLAM完全是用Python编写的,可以在UNIX衍生系统上运行,并且是GNU公共许可证(v3)下的开放源代码。它以模块化的方式建立,并提供一个API,因此很容易扩展。CLAM以透明的XML格式进行通信,并使用XSL转换为人类终端用户提供了一个现代的客户端生成的网络界面。

trans-unit.source: CLAM is set up in a universal fashion, requiring minimal effort on the part of the service developer. Your actual NLP application is treated as a black box, of which only the parameters, input formats and output formats need to be described. Your application itself needs not be network aware in any way, nor aware of CLAM, and the handling and validation of input can be taken care of by CLAM.
trans-unit.target: CLAM的设置方式是通用的,只需要服务开发者付出最小的努力。你的实际NLP应用被当作一个黑盒子,其中只需要描述参数、输入格式和输出格式。你的应用本身不需要以任何方式意识到网络,也不需要意识到CLAM,输入的处理和验证可以由CLAM来处理。
文件资料
可在https://clam.readthedocs.io上找到文档

在Linux上安装

trans-unit.source: Installation from the Python Package Index using the package manager pip it the recommended way to intall CLAM. This is the easiest method of installing CLAM, as it will automatically fetch and install any dependencies. We recommend to use a virtual environment (
trans-unit.target: 使用软件包管理器从Python包索引安装PIP它的推荐方式intall CLAM。这是安装CLAM的最简单方法，因为它将自动获取并安装所有依赖项。我们建议使用虚拟环境（

trans-unit.source: It’s discouraged to download the zip packages or tarballs from github, install CLAM from the Python Package Index or use git properly.
trans-unit.target: 不建议从github下载zip包或tarball，从Python Package Index安装CLAM 或正确使用git。

trans-unit.source: Navigate your browser to http://localhost:8080 and verify everything works
trans-unit.target: 将浏览器导航到http：// localhost：8080并验证一切正常

trans-unit.source: Note that sudo/root access is needed to install globally. Ask your system administrator to install it if you do not own the system. Alternatively, you can install it locally in a Python virtual environment:
trans-unit.target: 注意,需要sudo/root权限才能在全球范围内安装。如果您不拥有系统,请询问您的系统管理员来安装它。另外,您也可以在本地的 Python 虚拟环境中安装它。
